member.summary: A message-level interface to the MSMQ transport

member.summary: Receive a message from the transport

member.summary: The transport should be created if it was not found

member.name: P:MassTransit.Transports.Msmq.CreateMsmqTransportSettings.Transactional
member.summary: True if the endpoint should be transactional. If Transactional is true and the endpoint already exists and is not transactional, an exception will be thrown.

member.name: P:MassTransit.Transports.Msmq.CreateMsmqEndpointSettings.ErrorAddress
member.summary: The address of the endpoint where invalid messages should be moved

member.name: P:MassTransit.Transports.Msmq.CreateMsmqEndpointSettings.PurgeExistingMessages
member.summary: True if any existing messages at the endpoint should be purged when the endpoint is created

member.name: P:MassTransit.Transports.Msmq.CreateMsmqEndpointSettings.Serializer
member.summary: The serializer to use for messages on the endpoint

member.summary: The format name used to talk to MSMQ

member.name: P:MassTransit.Transports.Msmq.IMsmqEndpointAddress.LocalName
